name: PageView
desc: A scrollable list that works page by page.

fields.name: allowImplicitScrolling
fields.desc: Controls whether the widget's pages will respond to [RenderObject.showOnScreen], which will allow for implicit accessibility scrolling.

fields.name: scrollDirection
fields.desc: The [Axis] along which the scroll view's offset increases with each page.

fields.name: reverse
fields.desc: Whether the page view scrolls in the reading direction.

fields.name: controller
fields.desc: An object that can be used to control the position to which this page view is scrolled.

fields.name: physics
fields.desc: How the page view should respond to user input.

fields.name: pageSnapping
fields.desc: Set to false to disable page snapping, useful for custom scroll behavior.

fields.name: onPageChanged
fields.desc: Called whenever the page in the center of the viewport changes.

fields.name: childrenDelegate
fields.desc: A delegate that provides the children for the [PageView].

fields.name: padEnds
fields.desc: Whether to add padding to both ends of the list.
